title: The Secret to Data-Driven Dynamic Subscriptions in Paginated Reports
excerpt: We've been waiting a long time to see this! Finally dynamic subscriptions are available for Power BI Paginated reports! Maybe Patrick cried a little he was soooo happy!  Dynamic subscriptions for paginated reports (Preview) https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/dynamic-subscriptions-for-paginated-reports-preview/
